content:
Supreme Court October 2025 Oral Arguments Schedule

• Starting: Monday, October 6, 2025
• Notable Cases: Constitutional challenges on attorney admission, First Amendment journalist protections, immigration enforcement, and digital surveillance rights
• Schedule: Updated calendar with case synopses and questions presented

View full schedule in News • Official Supreme Court Calendar

Hardly Strictly Bluegrass Festival Livestream

• Event: Annual free bluegrass festival in Golden Gate Park
• Livestream: Available for remote viewing this weekend
• Featured Artists: Multiple stages with traditional and contemporary bluegrass performers
• Schedule: Check official site for performance times and artist lineup

Official Website • View in Rooster, Banjo, and Horseshoe Hill Stages in Media

Patriots @ Bills — Prediction Markets

• Game: Patriots @ Bills
• Start: Oct 5, 2025 8:20 PM ET
• Odds: BUF win 79¢ — NE win 21¢
• Source: Kalshi | Polymarket

View all prediction markets

Manufacturing PMI Update

• September: 49.1 (+0.4 pts from Aug)
• Status: Still in contraction (below 50) but improving
• Context: Highest reading since June, signaling potential stabilization

View all indicators

Private Employment Update

• September: 134.53M (-32K MoM from Aug)
• Trend: Down 35K from July peak of 134.56M
• Context: ADP data shows softening in private sector hiring

View all indicators

Federal Court: AAUP v. Rubio — First Amendment for Non-Citizens

• Date: Sept 30, 2025 — Judge William G. Young
• Ruling: Court found administration officials engaged in viewpoint discrimination and chilled pro-Palestinian speech; non-citizens entitled to First Amendment protections under existing precedent.
• Significance: Detailed factual findings, novel use of immigration enforcement for political speech condemned; remedy hearing set (relief limited to subordinate officials).

Read full summary on News • Read full 161-page opinion (PDF)

NFL Week 5: 49ers @ Rams Odds Update

• Market Movement: 49ers odds drop to 28¢ (from 30¢)
• Current Line: Rams -4.5 (72% implied probability)
• Game: Thursday Night Football, 10/02, 5:15 PM PDT

View all prediction markets

Tariff Revenue Update

• August Revenue: $30B (+7.1% MoM, +266% since March)
• 2025 Total: $131.2B through August
• Monthly Avg: $21.9B in 2025 (current $30B is +37% above avg)
• Trend: 4th consecutive monthly increase

View all indicators

National Debt Update

• Total Debt: $37.5T (up $495B in Sep)
• 2025 Growth: +$1.28T YTD
• Monthly Avg: +$213B (last 6 months)

View all indicators

Budget Deficit Update

• August Deficit: -$344.8B (largest since May)
• YTD Trend: 4 of last 6 months in deficit
• July-August: -$635.9B combined shortfall

View all indicators

Border Update

• Southern Border Encounters: 9,740 in Aug (+24.5% MoM)
• After two months of decline, encounters rose sharply in August
• Current levels remain below May's peak of 12,451

View all indicators

September 2025 Financial Snapshot

• Housing Market: Pending Home Sales Index up to 74.7 in Aug (from 71.8 in Jul)
• Consumer Confidence: Declined to 94.2 in Sep (from 97.8 in Aug)
• Job Openings: 7.23M in Aug (up from 7.21M in Jul)

View all indicators

Site Updates

• Prediction Markets: Added separate Kalshi & Polymarket cards for NFL Week 5
• Military Drone Analysis: News

Key Economic Indicators

• TEUs (Port of LA/LB): 958,355.15 in Aug (-6.03% MoM)
• Housing Starts: 1.307M in Aug (-8.54% MoM)
• Manufacturing PMI: 48.7 in Aug (+1.46% MoM), still in contraction but improving
• 30-yr Mortgage Rate: 6.28% in Sep (-4.70% MoM)

View all indicators

New book added to Media:
  • Our Dollar, Your Problem by Kenneth Rogoff
Latest TBPS and acclaimed movie All We Imagine as Light now in Media. Consumer Sentiment decreased -4.81% MoM to 55.4 in September, as seen in Consumer Indicators in Financials.
2 IPOs to watch $FIGR, $KLAR

Watched The Seed of the Sacred Fig - A long (2 hrs 47 min) but fascinating film that vividly portrays the real-time threat to a theocracy through a family's dynamic. The movie's exploration of power, control, and resistance within a domestic setting offers a compelling microcosm of the larger societal tension in Iran.

New books added to Media:
  • World History in Minutes by Tat Wood and Dorothy Ail
  • From Beirut to Jerusalem by Thomas Friedman
  • The Big Score by Michael S. Malone
Continuing to monitor 'job hoarding' numbers where employers are reluctant to hire and fire. FOMC September prediction markets increased to 80% probability of a 25BP rate decrease. View in Numbers
New Journal entries on healthcare costs, sleep, and more.

Market & Economic Update

• Retail Sales (July): $726.23B, up 0.5% MoM
• Consumer Sentiment (Aug): 58.6, down from 61.7 in July
• Industrial Production (July): 104.0, flat MoM
• Correction: $HOOD Q2 earnings analysis has been updated with corrected figures. Please refer to the latest report for accurate data.

View all economic indicators | See market news

New books added (bad ones deleted after reading) to Media:
  • Please Yell at My Kids: A Parent's Guide to Setting Boundaries with Love
  • The AI Con: The Dangerous Truth About Artificial Intelligence
  • Diet, Drugs, and Dopamine: Finding Balance in the Age of Indulgence
  • How Not to Invest: Common Mistakes and How to Avoid Them
New: News Filtering! We've added category filters to the News page. Now you can easily sort and filter by IPO, Earnings, Policy, and Legal news. Try it out!

Employment Trends Index updated in Numbers with latest indicators and labor market data
Watch Outside Lands Live stream
Fixed webpage caching issues (some posts may not appear immediately)
Peloton stock surges 12% on UBS upgrade to Buy with $11 price target. Full analysis in News Section.
New additions: Hotel Salvation in Media section., The Power of Money in Media section. Updated Sentiment and JOLTS data in Numbers section.

Updated housing data and PMI flash now in Numbers. The HMI (Housing Market Index) rose 1 point to 33 (scale 0-100, >50 indicates positive builder sentiment). PMI readings above 50 signal sector expansion, while below 50 indicates contraction. Both are leading indicators of economic health.
New book added: Clean Code by Robert C. Martin - A handbook of agile software craftsmanship that teaches how to write clean, maintainable code.

Figma IPO announced - $13.65B valuation, $25-28 price range. Full analysis in News Section. Financial indicators updated with latest Leading, Lagging Economic Indicators, container TEUs, Housing Starts, Sentiment, etc. in Macro.
New Books 📚 page here.
Budget $27B Surplus here.

Make sure to refresh page so you get latest version of the site. Also try clearing your browser cache or using incognito mode if you encounter issues, old dog.

Updated Macro in Financial Insight with Copper Futures and FOMC Prediction Markets.
Consolidated Financial and Legal News into one page here.
Proposed CA Bills for building more here.
81% chance FOMC rates remain unchanged in July per prediction markets.
The Animal Kingdom watch section.
Supreme Court 2024 Financial Disclosures here.
Announcements will remain here. Commentary will be in new '✍️' Journal section.

AIRO Group Holdings IPO: Aerospace/defense company priced at $10, surged 140% on debut. $60M raised, focuses on drones, eVTOL, avionics.
Summary in '' Financial News section.

May 2025 Treasury report: $4.85T outlays YTD, $3.48T receipts, $1.36T deficit. Net interest $776B (16% of total outlays). See full report here.

Donald J. Trump 2025 Financial Disclosure Summary: Top sources of income led by $57M in token sales via World Liberty Financial, followed by golf clubs, hotels, and municipal bonds. Total reported 2025 income estimated between $90M - $180M. Full report here.
CBO Report here and End Prescription Drug Ads Now Act here.
New Financials Page here Supreme Court Analysis here.

New position $IVES

maybe it's time for alternative methods to estimate CPI. AI > human enumerators.

Circle IPO tomorrow. S-1 Sum in '💸' ipo section.
Latest TBPS in watch section.
Need to relook at $USAAX, $LSGRX, $NWZMX, $FBCGX, $STCIX, $BDAIX. You know what they had in 2023? $NVDA. That's what. Loomis Sayles bought Nvidia on a price dip in 2019!
Summary of FOMC May Meeting minutes in '🗒️' monetary section.
Rotten Tomatoes and IMDb ratings added to watch section.
Allen Stone 🎤 in listen section.

Holy Spider in watch section.
About: Female journalist Rahimi (Zar Amir Ebrahimi) travels to the Iranian holy city of Mashhad to investigate a serial killer who believes he is doing the work of God, cleansing the streets of sinners by murdering sex workers. As the body count mounts, and Rahimi draws closer to exposing his crimes, the opportunity for justice grows harder to attain as the 'Spider Killer' is embraced by many as a hero. Based on the horrific true story of serial killer Saeed Hanaei, acclaimed writer/director Ali Abbasi (Border) unveils a gripping crime thriller, and a daring indictment of a society in which rough justice is routinely a fact of life.
